trends: There has been one other sighting in Connelly Springs
There were no other sightings in Connelly Springs on or around February 27th 2013
Summary: it was round, with red and blue lights around it, with a white light on top
divs: Sighting DetailsI FIRST SAW THE UFO ON A WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOUT 12:30 AM ON MARCH 27, 2013 I SPOTED IT WHEN I TOOK MY DOG OUT FOR THE NIGHT, IT WAS ABOVE THE TREES HOVERING AND MOVING UP AND DOWN SLIGHTLEY, IT HAD RED LIGHT AND BLUE LIGHTS AROUN IT`S BODY, AND A WHITE LIGHT ON TOP, I KEPT WATCHING IT FOR ABOUT 10 MINUTES, THEN I WENT AND GOT MY WIFE AND ASKED HERE IF I WAS SEEING THINGS, SO SHE LOOKED AND SAW IT TOO, SO WE WATCHED IT HOVER AND WATCHED THE LIGHTS GOING AROUND IT, WE WHATCHED IT FOR WHILE, THEN WE GOT TIRED AND WENT TO BED ABOUT AN HOUR LATER. I THEN SAW IT AGAIN 2 MORE TIME THE SAME STYLE ON MARCH 2,2013 AT 1:00 AM AND THEN AGAIN ON MARCH 3,2013 ABOUT 12:30 AM
